thread.title: Joanna Kavourinos
thread.title_full: Seven Women Maternity Apparel reviewed by Joanna Kavourinos

author: Joanna Kavourinos
title: Joanna Kavourinos
text: I purchased a dress for my baby shower next month and found it was no longer avaliable after I had purchased it. However got a great phone call from Stephanie and she provided options for me; to which I chose another dress. Fits great, looks good and happy still with my purchase.
